.vs/
.vscode/

bin/
obj/
out/
Debug/
Release/

# Temporary build files
*.tmp
*.bak
*.log
*.user

*.suo
*.cache
*.pdb

# Visual Studio auto-generated indexes
*.vsidx
*.vsspell
*.slnx.cache/

.idea/
*.sln.iml

# NuGet
